summary: Diff adds a single Motoko backend actor with data models for profiles/posts/stories/reels/messages and adds substantial frontend structure: authenticated app routing/layout with a global header + navigation, AI Tools (writing tool, local image generator, local rules-based chatbot), Study Tools (whiteboard + slides), and multiple browser mini-games (Tic-Tac-Toe, Memory Match, Snake, 2048, Quiz). Some requirements cannot be verified due to many omitted/truncated added files. Clear gaps are avatar upload UI for profiles and the slides tool not showing support for multiple text blocks per slide.

missing_requirements.requirement: Support optional avatar image in the in-app user profile, including a way for the user to set/upload it after first login.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend profile type includes an avatar field, but the shown profile setup UI always submits `avatar: undefined` and provides no avatar upload/select control, so users cannot set an avatar from the UI based on available evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Slide tool supports adding text blocks (not just a single text area per slide) and editing them.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided Slides tool structure indicates each slide contains a single `content: string` edited as one textarea; no evidence of multiple text blocks per slide is shown in the diff snippet.

hallucinated_features.description: Role/permission-based authorization mixin (AccessControl + MixinAuthorization) used to gate profile access.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires basic authorization, but does not request adding/using a specific mixin-based access control framework; this is additional functionality/implementation detail beyond the requested feature set.
BuildRequest asks for a coherent visual theme and explicitly forbids blue/purple, but does not request system theme toggling/provider behavior; this is extra behavior beyond requirements.
